headline: Kimberly-Clark (KMB)’s Created the Perfect Scenarior, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 16 Latest Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. Kimberly-Clark Corporation (NASDAQ:KMB) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. After Kimberly-Clark Corporation (NASDAQ:KMB) announced its mega $48.7 billion acquisition of Kenvue, Jim Cramer hasn’t been able to help himself when discussing the firm.
